title: Playing for Today, and Tomorrow
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: The Finals, Juneteenth, Kyrie, Title IX and your stories about that friend taking things too far!
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones shares his thoughts on the Warriors winning the NBA Championship and how the result reflects on PG Stephen Curry (1:30). Plus, possible movement for Nets G Kyrie Irving this summer (19:34), a Title IX-themed IYHH as we approach the 50th anniversary of its passage into law (34:23), and your voicemails about that one friend who takes things just a little "too far" (48:27)!


IYHH Stories

  1. @neil_paine shares what 50 Years Of Title IX Has — And Hasn't — Accomplished: https://53eig.ht/3tOwq5v
  2. @nrarmour’s project ‘Title IX: Falling short at 50’ exposes how colleges still fail women: https://bit.ly/3N6YgR8
  3. @biancaquilan says Biden, Cardona to make June update to Title IX: https://politi.co/3OtUSRg
